properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 5 at 3:30PM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation
expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice
accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. For the Winter
Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4
to 8 inches.

* WHERE...Onondaga, Madison, Cortland, Chenango and Otsego
counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this
evening to 1 PM EST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from
late Thursday night through Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
